title: Electronic Portfolio Design Course for Competency-Based Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language communication skills and professional work experience
context.additional_context: A process for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to acquire language competencies required in work environments through practical tasks and cumulatively manage results via e-portfolios

learning_goals: Learners can perform language tasks required in real job situations (e.g., medical record writing, legal document translation, technical manual interpretation) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can systematically record work outcomes in e-portfolios according to competency-based assessment criteria.
Learners experience revising and improving language tasks at least twice based on peer and instructor feedback.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
